thread.title: Cleveland to "phase out," but not close, eight schools after turnaround efforts flounder
thread.title_full: Cleveland to "phase out," but not close, eight schools after turnaround efforts flounder

author: Patrick O'Donnell, The Plain Dealer
title: Cleveland to "phase out," but not close, eight schools after turnaround efforts flounder
text: The Cleveland school district's efforts to turn around eight schools didn't work well enough, so it will redesign new schools within the buildings
